ComicInfo.Summary:
Hard by a Great Forest: Vampirella is lured into the Witch's house to be a meal for Hansel and Gretel.
Vampire's New Clothes: Demons try to trick Vampirella into wearing inappropriate clothing but the tables get turned on them.
Feary Tales: Vampirella continues on her journey through the tales of the mysterious book.
ComicInfo.Title: Hard by a Great Forest; Vampire's New Clothes; Feary Tales
ComicInfo.Writer: Eric Trautmann,Nancy A. Collins,Stuart Moore,Eric Trautmann,Stuart Moore
